name: Megalovania Piano Tiles - Undertale 💀
description:
Megalovania Piano Tiles

Why do you have to have this game?
Now there is a very entertaining game, especially for those of you who love piano tiles.
In this piano tiles game you can play while practicing finger speed and concentration in touching the piano tiles.

There are many undertale songs that can be played in this piano tiles game.

Song categories:
Undertale - Megalovania
Undertale - Bonetrousle
Undertale - Death by Glamor
Undertale - Hopes and Dreams
Undertale - Memory

How to play :
- Press the start bar to start piano tiles.
- Touch the blue bar continuously following the accompaniment of songs played by piano music.
- Avoid black blades carefully, otherwise you will experience surprises.
- Get your highest score in this piano tiles game.

Play this game of Piani tiles now.
